Author: jamiequint
Content: I wrote this in Ruby & C (for the prime finder) and it runs equivalently fast (under 1 second)

Author: bootload
Title: Mozilla and The Evolution of the Browser

Author: ecuzzillo
Content:
If you already have windows hardware, Ubuntu will autodetect all your hardware automatically. I've installed it on both my desktop and laptop, and it detected everything (wireless, sound, video, you name it) without a hitch. Insertion of install CD to up-and-running time: about 30-40 minutes.

So, even if your time is expensive, it still takes less time than it does to go get a Mac.

Author: hiroaki
Title: I am looking for a job. Any startups out there with open positions?

Author: ecuzzillo
Content: Low millions probably means low ones-of-millions, which is non-fuck-you money in return for a situation which you'd probably want to say fuck-you to, at least if you believe the general sense around here that Google's status as the ultimate hacker's mecca has begun to fade.
